atg.rest.filtering
Interface RestPropertyCustomizer

public interface RestPropertyCustomizer

An interface used to expose custom properties on components for REST requests.

See Also:
FilteringManager

          Class version string

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getPropertyValue

java.lang.Object getPropertyValue(java.lang.String pPropertyName,
                                  java.lang.Object pResource)
Returns the property value specified by pPropertyName.

Parameters:
pPropertyName - the name of the property to return
pResource - the resource which the specified property is associated with
Returns:
the value of the property

setPropertyValue

void setPropertyValue(java.lang.String pPropertyName,
                      java.lang.Object pValue,
                      java.lang.Object pResource)
Sets the value of the specified property. Note that this method is not used by the REST subsystem but is provided for convenience. Implementing the method is optional.

Parameters:
pPropertyName - the name of the property to set
pValue - the value to associate with pPropertyName
pResource - the resource which the specified property is associated with
